data.description: The queen of the vampires makes an impromptu appearance on a televised talk show to announce her plans for a mysterious island located off the coast of Japan.
data.title: Prom Night

data.description: High school student Akira Kaburagi isn’t interested in vampires, but when he finds himself in the middle of an assassination attempt on Mina, a promise from his past comes rushing back to him.
data.title: Howling

data.description: The student council is outraged when news of Mina’s arrival gets out, and Akira struggles to deal with the cold, hard facts: he’s a werewolf sworn to serve the queen of the vampires!
data.title: Teen Wolf

data.description: Mina calls a press conference in an attempt to quiet the public uproar over the Bund, but a last-minute change to the security detail could put both humans and vampires at risk.
data.title: Interview with the Vampire

data.description: A high-profile student’s disappearance puts Mina in hot water with the student council, and the Prime Minister takes drastic steps to reject her plans for the Bund.
data.title: Shadow of the Vampire

data.description: Mina refuses to let anything stand in the way of her mission to establish the Bund, but Akira’s loyalty to his new master is shaken when he learns that vampires have infiltrated the school
data.title: From Dusk Till Dawn
Innocent Blood
data.description: Despite their differences, Mina and Akira must learn to work together in order to save some student council members from the rogue vampires who’ve taken them hostage.
On the surface, things appear to have calmed down at the academy, but among the students there are deep physical and psychological scars that have not yet healed.
data.title: Near Dark

data.description: Akira’s curiosity about the concept of eternity leads him to ask Mina questions that are difficult to answer. Though it may sound promising, eternity is not without its harsh realities.
data.title: The Lost Boys

data.description: The Bund is finally enjoying some well-earned peace when chaos visits once more - the Three Clans have appeared in the Bund, putting Akira’s life in grave peril.
data.title: Walpurgis Night

data.description: Killers-for-hire stalk Akira, and the werewolf’s inability to transform puts his life in jeopardy. Meanwhile, Mina raises the stakes of her wager after a particularly unpleasant test of her purity.
data.title: Underworld
Dance In The Vampire Bund
data.description: Two beastly warriors shed blood in defense of identical princesses, and Mina learns the shocking secret behind the legacy of the true bloods!
